alert.note: Alert for Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 1:12PM EST until February 23 at 9:34AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Ohio, including the following county, Stark. * WHEN...Until 730 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 111 PM EST, Gauge reports indicated heavy rain and snowmelt due to rain and snowmelt. Flooding is already occurring in and near Waynesburg. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Waynesburg. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
